TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicResourceExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现一个标记扩展，该标记扩展支持从 XAML 中进行的动态资源引用。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that supports dynamic resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用可能会在运行时更改的内容时，动态资源引用是必需的。Dynamic resource references are necessary when referencing content that might change at run-time. 内容更改的原因可能是应用程序启动，也可能是外部。The reasons for the content change might be application-initiated or might be external. 一个示例是指要包括依赖于报告用户配置首选项，如主题、 字体设置等的系统资源的样式。One example is if you are including styles that rely on system resources that report user-configured preferences, such as themes, font settings and so on. 此类是标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. 中的标记扩展类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]存在主要是为了提供基础结构支持的某些方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器实现中，并由标记扩展类不会从通常调用公开的成员直接用户代码。Markup extension classes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by the markup extension classes are not typically called from directly user code. 特别是，此类支持[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)从使用情况[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This class particularly supports the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 有关动态资源引用的详细信息，请参阅[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。For more information about dynamic resource references, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md). ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object resourceKey) cil managed

param.name: resourceKey
param.span: 此标记扩展所引用资源的键。

span.span: The key of the resource that this markup extension references.

summary.span: 用提供的初始键初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the provided initial key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用此构造函数[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器处理的特性语法时[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。This constructor is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processors when processing the attribute syntax for the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可以为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.

summary.span: 返回一个应在此扩展应用的属性上设置的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

summary.span: 对于 ，这是当前父级链的资源字典中的对象，该对象的键由 指定。

span.span: For , this is the object found in a resource dictionary in the current parent chain that is keyed by the .

returns.span: 要在应用了扩展的属性上设置的对象。

span.span: The object to set on the property where the extension is applied.

returns.span: 这是一个将在稍后计算的表达式，而不是实际值。

span.span: Rather than the actual value, this will be an expression that will be evaluated at a later time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器实现中，并且不应直接调用。This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器实现使用此方法，以便正确处理[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)对象创建期间的值。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) values during object creation. 要通过提供的值设置的属性必须为类型。The property to be set by the provided value must be of type . 此实现不依赖于基于传递的任何服务`serviceProvider`。This implementation does not rely on any services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.

exception.span: 尝试为未提供 的扩展提供值。

span.span: Attempted to provide a value for an extension that did not provide a .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ ResourceKey { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.ResourceKey : obj with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置此动态资源引用指定的键。

span.span: Gets or sets the key specified by this dynamic resource reference.

summary.span: 该键用于通过中间表达式在资源字典中查找资源。

span.span: The key is used to lookup a resource in resource dictionaries, by means of an intermediate expression.

value.span: 此动态资源引用指定的资源键。

span.span: The resource key that this dynamic resource reference specifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此键不强类型，但通常作为字符串，提供，或派生的类。The key is not strongly typed, but is usually provided as either a string, a , or a derived class. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).
